ugen0.5:  at usbus0
run0: <1.0> on usbus0
run0: MAC/BBP RT3070 (rev 0x0201), RF RT2020 (MIMO 1T1R), address d8:5d:4c:98:3b:7f
run0: firmware RT2870 loaded
